meta.name: Real-Time Sales Pipeline Analytics with Bright Data, OpenAI, and Google Sheets

nodes.name: ğŸ¤– Monitor Sales Pipeline (CRM AI Agent)

parameters.text:
=You are a data analyst connected to Bright Data MCP scraping tool.

Scrape CRM-like sales data from this public API:
{{ $json.URL }}

Treat each user as a sales lead. For each entry, extract and simulate the following fields:

{
"leadId": <use id>,
"rep": <use name>,
"stage": <use username as deal stage>,
"value": <convert address.zipcode to number and use as deal value>,
"status": <use company.name to randomly assign status as "open", "won", or "lost">
}

Then:

Calculate total number of leads

Total value of pipeline

Count of leads in each stage

Count of deals by status: open, won, lost

Identify top 3 reps based on simulated deal value

nodes.name: ğŸ§© Split Metrics for Sheet Rows

parameters.content:
# ğŸš€ Smart CRM Scraper & Pipeline Health Analyzer (n8n + Bright Data + Google Sheets)

This automation workflow is perfect for sales ops, marketers, analysts, or even founders who want to:

* ğŸ“¥ Scrape sales pipeline data from CRM dashboards
* ğŸ“Š Get insights into reps, leads, and statuses
* ğŸ“ Store it all in Google Sheets automatically â€” no copy/paste, no coding

Letâ€™s break this into 3 simple sections ğŸ‘‡

---

ğŸ”·â€‚SECTION 1: Start & Set Target
ğŸ§© Combines these nodes:

* âš¡ Trigger: Start CRM Scraper
* ğŸ”— Set Source URL (CRM/JSONPlaceholder)

ğŸ“Œâ€‚What Happens Here?
This section is where your automation begins. You:

1. Manually run the workflow by clicking â–¶ï¸ â€œExecute Workflowâ€
2. Define the website or CRM source you want to scrape

Example:

* You paste a mock CRM URL (e.g. [https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com](https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com)) â€” but in a real scenario, it could be a Bright Data-accessible CRM dashboard.

âœ¨ Benefits for Beginners:
âœ… No coding â€” just click + paste a URL
âœ… Easily swap out URLs for different CRM dashboards
âœ… Full control over when scraping starts

ğŸ¯ Icons Summary:
âš¡ Manual Start | ğŸ”— Source URL Setup

ğŸ’¡ Real-World Use:
Replace the URL with a live CRM performance dashboard hosted inside Bright Dataâ€™s mobile proxy network.

---

ğŸ¤–â€‚SECTION 2: AI Agent â€” Scrape + Analyze
ğŸ§© Combines:

* ğŸ¤– Monitor Sales Pipeline (CRM AI Agent)

  * ğŸ§  AI Brain (CRM Query Generator)
  * ğŸŒ Bright Data MCP (scrape\_as\_markdown)
  * ğŸ§¾ Clean JSON Parser (Pipeline Metrics)

ğŸ“Œâ€‚What Happens Here?

This is the â€œthinkingâ€ part of the workflow.

1. ğŸ§  AI Brain: OpenAI understands the task. It generates instructions like:
   â€ƒâ€œScrape rep names, stages, leads, health from this CRM dashboard as markdown.â€

2. ğŸŒ Bright Data Tool: The MCP tool accesses the page invisibly (like a phone browser) and extracts pipeline data using its scrape\_as\_markdown tool.

3. ğŸ§¾ Structured Output Parser: Converts the scraped messy text into a structured JSON format like this:

```json
[
  {
    "rep": "Alice",
    "leads": 22,
    "stage": "Proposal",
    "status": "At Risk"
  },
  ...
]
```

âœ¨ Benefits for Beginners:
âœ… Zero scraping code
âœ… Handles login-blocked or bot-protected CRMs via mobile proxies
âœ… Clean data format â€” easy to use in Sheets or dashboards

ğŸ¯ Icons Summary:
ğŸ§  OpenAI Logic | ğŸŒ Bright Data Scraper | ğŸ§¾ JSON Cleaner

ğŸ’¡ Real-World Use:
Scrape weekly CRM dashboards from tools like HubSpot, Pipedrive, Salesforce (if routed via Bright Data), and turn them into structured performance data.

---

ğŸŸ¨â€‚SECTION 3: Format & Store to Google Sheets
ğŸ§© Combines:

* ğŸ§© Split Metrics for Sheet Rows
* ğŸ“Š Store CRM Insights (Google Sheet)

ğŸ“Œâ€‚What Happens Here?

1. ğŸ§© Split JSON: This node breaks the final structured output into individual items (one per sales rep), so each one becomes a row in your spreadsheet.

2. ğŸ“Š Google Sheet Node: Adds each row into a connected Google Sheet â€” storing columns like:

| rep   | leads | stage     | status  |
| ----- | ----- | --------- | ------- |
| Alice | 22    | Proposal  | At Risk |
| Bob   | 17    | Qualified | Healthy |

âœ¨ Benefits for Beginners:
âœ… Saves all CRM data automatically â€” no manual data entry
âœ… Compatible with Google Data Studio / Looker / Excel
âœ… Great for sharing with managers or teams

ğŸ¯ Icons Summary:
ğŸ§© JSON Splitter | ğŸ“Š Sheet Writer

ğŸ’¡ Real-World Use:
Use it for live pipeline visibility. Sync Sheets with dashboards or reporting tools, or use for daily monitoring via automations.

---

ğŸ“¦ Final Summary Table

| Step       | Node Name                                 | Purpose                                      |
| ---------- | ----------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------- |
| 1ï¸âƒ£ Input  | âš¡ Trigger: Start CRM Scraper              | Manually trigger the workflow                |
|            | ğŸ”— Set Source URL (CRM/JSONPlaceholder)   | Define where to scrape the CRM data from     |
| 2ï¸âƒ£ Agent  | ğŸ¤– Monitor Sales Pipeline (CRM AI Agent)  | Smart agent to analyze CRM                   |
|            | ğŸ§  AI Brain (CRM Query Generator)         | Creates scrape instructions                  |
|            | ğŸŒ Bright Data MCP (scrape\_as\_markdown) | Executes scrape via MCP mobile network       |
|            | ğŸ§¾ Clean JSON Parser (Pipeline Metrics)   | Converts scrape results into structured data |
| 3ï¸âƒ£ Output | ğŸ§© Split Metrics for Sheet Rows           | Breaks each record into its own row          |
|            | ğŸ“Š Store CRM Insights (Google Sheet)      | Saves data into Google Sheet row-by-row      |
